nodes.text: Foreman was the title held by the lead engineer of the Techno Union. Wat Tambor was the foreman of the Techno Union during the final years of the Galactic Republic until his death and the coglomerate's nationalization by the new Galactic Empire at the end of the Clone Wars. Okadiah Garson was the foreman of a Moonglow Polychemical mining team. Proach was a foreman for the Mining Guild. Darrus Rantarovo was a foreman on the Big Settlement hydro farm.
